action.action-desc: Ms. Stabenow (for herself, Mr. Blunt, Mr. Brown, and Mr. Roberts) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to raise the limitation on the election to accelerate the AMT credit in lieu of bonus depreciation for 2013.

section.header: Temporary increase in limitation on election to accelerate the AMT credit in lieu of bonus depreciation

subsection.text: Subparagraph (J) of section 168(k)(4) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following new clause:

clause.text: In the case of round 3 extension property placed in service by a corporationâ€”

subclause.text: the term maximum increase amount means an amount that is 50 percent of the AMT credit increase amount determined with respect to such corporation under subparagraph (E).

subsection.text: The amendment made by this section shall apply to property placed in service after December 31, 2012, in taxable years ending after such date.
